Brookhaven.WPCH-TV: WPCH-TV, virtual channel 17 (UHF digital channel 20), is an independent television station licensed to Atlanta, Georgia, United States. The station is owned by Meredith Corporation, as part of a duopoly with CBS affiliate WGCL-TV (channel 46). The two stations share studios on 14th Street in northwestern Atlanta; WPCH-TV's transmitter is located in North Druid Hills.
